headLine: Announcement1
title: April Fool's1
message: 1) April Fools' Day or April Fool's Day is an annual custom on 1 April consisting of practical jokes and hoaxes. Jokesters often expose their actions by shouting 'April Fools!' at the recipient. Mass media can be involved in these pranks, which may be revealed as such the following day
